name: wxcloudrun-express
description: 微信云托管 express 框架模版

scripts.dev:80: set PORT=80&& node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.local
scripts.dev:3000: set PORT=3000&& node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.local
scripts.test:monitor: node -e "const { PerformanceMonitor } = require('./performanceMonitor'); const monitor = new PerformanceMonitor(); setInterval(() => console.log(JSON.stringify(monitor.getPerformanceStats(), null, 2)), 3000);"
